sentences.en: Are we bunny - hopping all the way to allce?
sentences.cn: 我们要象兔子一样跳着到艾利斯去 吗 ?

sentences.en: Billy Bunny burst his big beautiful blue balloon.
sentences.cn: 巴尼?比利把他漂亮的蓝色的气球弄破了.

sentences.en: Bunny is enduring painful flight, rear however medium one arrow.
sentences.cn: 兔子忍着痛苦逃跑, 尾部却又中了一箭.

sentences.en: Children color eggs and hunt for eggs hidden by the Easter Bunny.
sentences.cn: 复活节这一天,孩子们绘制彩蛋,并寻找复活节小兔藏起来的彩蛋.

sentences.en: Does the young prince play with the wittle bunny and the wittle skunk?
sentences.cn: 小王子就和小兔子和小臭鼬玩吖?

sentences.en: Following him . You said it, he is like the energized bunny.
sentences.cn: 你说过他好像一只劲量兔子?

sentences.en: He said they invariably bring up the Easter bunny but don't know the significance of the holiday to Christianity.
sentences.cn: 他说学生们总是一成不变地提到复活节兔子但是不知道这个节日对于基督教的重要性。

sentences.en: He was rabbit - toothed and was nicknamed Bunny.
sentences.cn: 他长了一口兔牙,绰号叫邦尼.

sentences.en: If you are a gym bunny, you belong in the circuIt'scene.
sentences.cn: 如果你喜欢健身, 那就属于封闭的环境场合.

sentences.en: One day, a bunny wants to race the tortoise.
sentences.cn: 一天, 兔子要和乌龟赛跑.

sentences.en: She laughed till the tears came to her eyes . " You dumb - bunny! "
sentences.cn: 她笑得流出泪来: “ 你个傻东西!

sentences.en: The children wanted to pat the bunny.
sentences.cn: 孩子们想轻拍这只兔子.

sentences.en: The Happy Bunny club was heaving.
Tina : Sure did. The bunny also brought some jelly - bean candy.
sentences.cn: 蒂娜: 带了,还带了一些豆胶糖.

sentences.en: Why couldn't you put the bunny back in the box?
sentences.cn: 为什么你不把小兔子放进箱子里?

words.tran_cn: 兔子（特别是小兔子）；可爱女郎

phrases.tran_cn: 兔八哥；兔宝宝（美国的卡通兔子人物）
（复活节人们用作礼物或装饰品的）复活节兔子；[美俚]令人仰慕的人

trans.tran_en: a word for a rabbit, used especially by or to children
